metadata.title: CVE-2024-5693 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: Offscreen Canvas did not properly track cross-origin tainting, which couldbe used to access image data from another site in violation of same-originpolicy. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 127 and Firefox ESR < 115.12.

criterions.comment: mozjs102 package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
